title: Claimed By An Alpha
description: Max’s insatiable craving for Candy consumes him.Her billionaire lover keeps rocking her world.Will their passion put them in a compromising situation?He misses her.He just wanted a quick kiss.She was too happy to oblige.She should’ve known he was up to no good... when she found him hiding in a storage room.An innocent afternoon kiss turns into a hot make out session.Certain debaucheries should be kept for a more private setting.Max thinks he controls everything... but he doesn’t.Will they get caught red handed doing unspeakable things?This is Part 3 of 4 of this fairytale BBW romance novel with the right touch of naughty!Get it now.
author: Scarlett Avery
